summary.para: Values that identify the intended use of a constant-data buffer.
summary.blockquote: [!NOTE] For programming with Direct3D 10, this API has a type alias that begins D3D10_ instead of D3D_. These Direct3D 10 type aliases are defined in d3d10.h, d3d10misc.h, and d3d10shader.h.

member.name: D3D_SHADER_CBUFFER_FLAGS.D3D_CBF_USERPACKED
member.summary: Bind the constant buffer to an input slot defined in HLSL code (instead of letting the compiler choose the input slot).

member.name: D3D_SHADER_CBUFFER_FLAGS.D3D10_CBF_USERPACKED
member.summary: Bind the constant buffer to an input slot defined in HLSL code (instead of letting the compiler choose the input slot).

member.name: D3D_SHADER_CBUFFER_FLAGS.D3D_CBF_FORCE_DWORD
member.summary: This value is not used by a programmer; it exists to force the enumeration to compile to 32 bits.
